REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2491 reute h f BC-CELLULAR-COMMUNICATIO 04-13 0049

TEXT.TITLE: CELLULAR COMMUNICATIONS <COMM.O> CLOSES BUYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Cellular Communications Inc said that a unit purchased a 6.99 pct interest in the Cincinnati non-wireline cellular system. As a result of the transaction, the company said it now owns 100 pct of the system in Cincinnati. Reuter
